name: Katuparan, 2021
description:
Post-interactive artwork see the link (https://bit.ly/3s16zXH)

8200 x 5000
Medium: Digital art, URL 

Katuparan means pagsagawa ng isang lunggati, balak, tungkulin, pangako, o katulad sa isang kasiya-siyang paraan. In english achievement, fulfillment, events.

In the middle of Tondo Manila, there is a community called Katuparan. Decrying the impending demolition of their homes amid an entire year without job security and health-based response to the COVID-19 pandemic, the residents of Katuparan are still fighting for their rights, for their home.  

Katuparan of our dreams. Katuparan is a community.  We are katuparan of every Filipino dreams. We are one. 


*Steve Manzano is the first artist that offers post-interactive work using open source links to provide a personal experience and filter the information that he wants to communicate and make people reflect on their own judgments.
